pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, July 16, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Informal Leaders’ Retreat on COVID-19.

Closed to media.

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Fédération des communautés francophones et acadienne du Canada.

Closed to media.
